SAMPLE.alias: TODO: Submitter designated name for the "Sample". The name must be unique within the submission account.
SAMPLE.center_name: TODO: The center name (its acronym) of the submitter's account
SAMPLE.broker_name: TODO: The center name (its acronym) of the broker if applicable, if not, remove this attribute (broker_name)
SAMPLE.TITLE: TODO: A short informative description of the sample. This text will be used to call out sample records in search results or in displays.

SAMPLE_NAME.TAXON_ID: TODO: NCBI Taxonomy Identifier of the organism (e.g. "9606" for human)
SAMPLE_NAME.SCIENTIFIC_NAME: TODO: Scientific name of sample that distinguishes its taxonomy. Please use a name or synonym that is tracked in the INSDC Taxonomy database (e.g. "homo sapiens")
SAMPLE_NAME.COMMON_NAME: TODO: GenBank common name of the organism (e.g. "human")

SAMPLE.DESCRIPTION: TODO: A description of the sample (e.g. its origin, its method of isolation, etc.) explaining how this sample is different from others if applicable.

SAMPLE_ATTRIBUTE.VALUE: TODO: Subject ID of the sample
TODO: Phenotype definition, EFO term (e.g. "EFO:0000574") recommended: https://www.ebi.ac.uk/efo/
SAMPLE_ATTRIBUTE.UNITS: TODO: Optional scientific unit, use "Experimental Ontology Factor accession" if the phenotype's value is an EFO term.

SAMPLE_ATTRIBUTE.TAG: TODO: Name of the custom attribute (e.g. age, height, BioSample IDs, additional notes, etc.)
SAMPLE_ATTRIBUTE.VALUE: TODO: Value of the custom attribute (e.g. "20", "SAME124633", etc.)
SAMPLE_ATTRIBUTE.UNITS: TODO: Optional scientific units (e.g. years, meters, EOF, etc.)
